channel.title: MySQL Problem - Delta & Serversided

item.title: MySQL Problem - Delta & Serversided
item.dc:creator: @ForeverPkers ForeverPkers
item.description:
@ForeverPkers wrote:

The website side works PERFECTLY fine.
www.foreverpkers.com/vote.html

Alright, you vote there, goes to the vote table, etc. The website coding is perfect.

Now, my problem is serversided. It won’t connect to the MySQL Database, using the driver. I do have the com folder in my source.
I know someone knows what’s wrong, it’s saying it can’t find the driver, but it should be able to. Some pics and code:

public static void createConnection() { try { Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver").newInstance(); con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://foreverpkersvot2.db.5972448.hostedresource.com", "foreverpkersvot2", "*MYPASSWORD IS HERE*"); stm = con.createStatement(); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }

And I have this in my server.java where all the class files are loaded

MYSQL.createConnection();

Please, please, please can someone tell me what’s wrong
I spent 3 hours getting this all working, and my only problem seems to be that it won’t connect!
My website connects using the same exact things but my server won’t because of the driver!

Thanks so much whoever has any details to help!

Read full topic
